claims.object: Movement of blood throughout the body through one continuous circuit of blood vessels

surface_layer.definition: The circulation of blood to all parts of the body except the lungs.

deep_layer.mechanism: Blood is pumped by the heart and travels through blood vessels to deliver oxygen and nutrients to tissues and remove waste products in the body, excluding the lungs.
deep_layer.origin: Evolution of circulatory systems in animals.

epistemic_metadata.source: Systemic and Special Circulations | Concise Medical Knowledge
